life.author: Albert Einstein
life.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.

life.author: Mahatma Gandhi
life.quote: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.

life.author: Oscar Wilde
life.quote: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.

life.author: Mark Twain
life.quote: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.

life.author: Confucius
life.quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.

life.author: Henry David Thoreau
life.quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.

life.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
life.quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.

life.author: John Lennon
life.quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.

life.author: Nelson Mandela
life.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

life.author: Steve Jobs
life.quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
